mapper.select: SELECT a.title, a.content, a.source_name as sourcename, b.img as imglink FROM wx_article a LEFT JOIN wx_gzh b ON a.gzh = b.en_name GROUP BY b.en_name LIMIT 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_order (order_id, user_id, open_id, price, statu, pay_statu, address, order_time) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{openId}, #{price}, #{statu}, #{payStatu}, #{address}, #{orderTime})
